author: Pamela Muse
text:
An Alliance member is looking for policies/information regarding the use of volunteers for City/County projects such as sheet rock work, painting, mowing of grounds, garbage removal and the like.
Any information/documentation you can provide is appreciated!
Pamela Muse
West Regional Director
Alliance for Innovation
